fields_of_interest: Business and Industry, Environment, Research and innovation, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: Our initiatives conserns mainly The Construction Products Regulation (CPR) and standards for steel design and execution, including CE-marking.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: The European Convention for Constructional Steelwork (ECCS): https://www.steelconstruct.com/site/
goals__remit: Norwegian Steel Association is an independent interest organization that works to promote professional development, knowledge and use of steel in all types of constructions. Members are associated organizations and individual companies from the Norwegian steel construction industry.
relevant_communication: We are organizing trainings and issue publications / text books for design and execution including Guidance for CE-marking.
